about.title: // about me
about.description: Hello, I'm André, I'm 19 years old and I graduated from COTEMIG technical high school, where I took the Web and Mobile development course. I'm currently in the 3rd period of the Systems Analysis and Development course at COTEMIG College. I develop websites and iOS applications with modern and high-quality interfaces, focused on performance, animations, responsiveness, and SEO.

skills.reactjs: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces. I use it to develop reusable components and reactive interfaces.
skills.nextjs: A React framework for web development with server-side rendering, loading optimization, and easy routing.
skills.javascript: A high-level, interpreted programming language with dynamic typing. Essential for frontend web development.
skills.typescript: A superset of JavaScript that adds optional static typing. Helps prevent common errors during development.
skills.nodejs: A JavaScript runtime for servers. I use it to build scalable, high-performance APIs with asynchronous support.
skills.tailwind: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework used to style pages quickly and efficiently.
skills.prisma: A modern ORM for Node.js and TypeScript that simplifies database access with type safety and auto-complete. I use it to model and query data efficiently.
skills.express: A minimalist framework for Node.js used to create APIs and servers. It simplifies routing and HTTP request handling.
skills.php: Creating dynamic web applications using PHP, with a focus on back-end development and database integration.
skills.uikit: UIKit is a traditional framework for iOS development. I use it to create interfaces with more precise control, ideal for projects requiring compatibility with older iOS versions.
skills.swift: Swift is a modern and safe language for iOS. SwiftUI is a declarative framework I use to build fluid, fast, and responsive interfaces for Apple apps.
skills.git: A distributed version control system. I use it to manage code history, collaborate in teams, and keep projects safely versioned.

projects.description: A collection of my latest projects in web and mobile development.
projects.CoverSpotSubtitle: Software that facilitates booking live music performances at venues.
projects.BonVoyageSubtitle: A travel management tool with personalized itineraries generated by AI.
projects.VoxGPTSubtitle: Chatbot focused on generating travel itineraries.
projects.NearbySubtitle: iOS benefit club app offering coupons for nearby establishments.
projects.CoverSpotDescription: A full-stack platform that revolutionizes the way musicians and venues connect for live performances. The system includes schedule management, direct fee negotiation, and an integrated review system. Its scalable architecture enables the simultaneous management of multiple events and provides data analysis for insights into local music trends.
projects.BonVoyageDescription: An innovative web application that uses artificial intelligence to generate personalized travel itineraries. This site was part of a project for the PIT (Technological Innovation Project) course at Cotemig in 2023. It offers users a travel guide with budget and duration estimates to create unique experiences. All site functionalities were developed by me.
projects.VoxGPTDescription: A tourism-focused chatbot that offers itinerary suggestions and answers questions about destinations. VoxGPT is a project that transforms travel planning into an immersive and personalized experience. Through the interface, the user enters a destination city, and OpenAI’s AI generates a travel guide with relevant information about the city and its tourist attractions. It also features a chat page with the AI.
projects.NearbyDescription: This project is a mobile benefit club app offering coupons for nearby businesses. It was developed as part of the NLW Pocket Mobile event, in which I participated.
projects.EstoqueDescription: A complete inventory management system with demand forecasting features and automatic restock alerts. I implemented an analytical dashboard with performance metrics and integrations with popular ERP systems. The solution uses smart caching, reducing page load times by 60%, and includes a robust role-based access control system.
